website_summaries.verdict: You get machine washable luxury with this 300 thread count down comforter from Serta.
pros: Choose your size, from twin to king
Box construction helps keep down distribution even
cons: A rare user finds a loose thread

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, great brand, great product.
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on-time during this special season. This white down comforter super comfortable to sleep with. It is light in weight. It is warm but perfect for all seasons. I live in southern California. This comforter is a perfect fit for the So-Cal weather, since in so-Cal it gets cold at night, hot during the day throughout the year. The product has no smells. It is clean, packed in a clear bag. I have been sleeping with the comforter for three weeks. I am satisfied with the purchase. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Graciela

customer_reviews.title: Leaks feathers terribly
customer_reviews.text: Pros: when it’s inside the duvet cover, it’s great. Doesn’t have the strong scent of down like some blankets do. Two stars for these things Cons: LEAKS FEATHERS EVERYWHERE. Anytime I change the duvet for washing, I have to do it outside or breathe feather particles. My studio is covered in the feathers all the time.
customer_reviews.author: EmmDeering

customer_reviews.title: Sleep like a baby! So soft and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Serta down comforter to replace the old one from Costco which starts turning yellow after several years of use. It’s pure white, super soft and fluffy and looks elegant! No noticeable odor at all right out of the zippered bag. It’s been almost 4 months since I changed the all-season down comforter, it provide the right warmth level I’m comfortable with so I can get sound sleep. I don’t get hot at night even during this summer time. Just hope the color could last white and fresh long!
customer_reviews.author: BHL

customer_reviews.title: Great Comforter for Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new comforter for my new place. I asked friends for recommendations. This one was recommended by some of my friends so I decided to try it. The comforter is very fluffy and comfortable. I have used it for few days, it is pretty warm too. I have a full size bed and the size of the comforter is pretty good. Overall, I really like the comforter and it is worth the price. A good comforter can increase your sleep quality and it would last longer. I highly recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: yoj

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and light
customer_reviews.text: I’ve heard of this brand and decided to try one of their product. The duvet is really light but also very warm. Unlike other duvets that I bought from online, it doesn’t have any smell when I first opened it up. Very very good value and satisfying purchase. I would recommend this brand to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: Great duvet for winter!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE IT!! I replaced my old comforter with this and it made a huge difference. 75% white down, 100% cotton, it’s very breathable, fluffy and warm. I’m glad I ordered extra warmth, because April in San Francisco still pretty chill, feel like most of the year is cold. With this, I’m getting much better sleep. We have a Cal King bed, king size comforter is just perfect. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Li Ma

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have purchased a goose feather comforter. When I open the package, it is really good quality. There is no strong smell,Soft and warm. The amount of goose feathers on this quilt is perfect for all seasons, especially Los Angeles.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and not sultry
customer_reviews.text: The quilt is very light and soft, the texture of the material used is very good, it won't feel sultry when it is covered, it was only known to a friend that this brand turned out to be a big brand, I really like it, and my husband also said it was more comfortable than the quilt covered before
customer_reviews.author: lan

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy and comfortably warm
customer_reviews.text: Came well packaged. I heard down comforter is not supposed to be compressed for a long time, and it came nice and fluffed up in a clear carrier. It smells just fine, with no harsh chemical smell. The packaging says to allow two days for full decompression so I assume I don't need to wash it. Out of precautions I still washed it and dried it. It had no trouble fluffing up. I would, however, try to avoid washing it as much as possible. It is the exact kind I needed, very light and snuggly, without being too warm.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Madison

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Moving to a new house, looking for a new comforter. I was not quite sure if the size will fit at first but it fits perfectly (I have a queen bed). Good quality and definitely great price! Material feels soft and don’t have any smell, I choose all-season fits great with my room temperature while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Lin Lin

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it two months ago and we have been using it until now and we really liked it, it is not only light-weighted but also thick enough to keep us warm. Compared to other comforter I bought, this is a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best Winter Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a comforter for the past long winter of the east coast and decided to give this one a try. It came well packed, looks high quality, and does not have any unpleasant smells. Best purchase ever! It is super warm and lightweight! Highly recommended if you need a wintertime comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Hao Li

customer_reviews.title: You don't want to leave your bed
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and fluffy! I got light warmth and it is enough for April and it does keep you really warm. It's got weight on it which I like very much. There's no chemical smell or anything. I'm so glad I purchased this comforter and it's exactly what I needed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Warm and soft
customer_reviews.text: Had this comforter for couple of weeks and love it! It's so warm and lightweight. It perfectly fit on my queen size bed. Very soft and fluffy. So comfortable and won't throw feathers anywhere. Nice quality, the down filling stay in the place. Overall better than I expect, definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Comforter
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love! Great quality and so comfy! Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for winter with fast delivery. I have used it for a couple of months, it’s still as fluffy as it just arrived. Really qualified for this price, I have bought some three hundred dollars products, there is not much difference.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft Warm And Comforable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the size is just right for my bed and it is so perfect! This is the only alternative down comforter that was just right for my bed. Feels very soft and comfortable to sleep under, plus warm enough and not too hot. The material is soft to the touch. So far so good...
customer_reviews.author: LIVIA

customer_reviews.title: Warm, light and comfortable stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and use it when i received. I found that this comforter is really light. I didn't feel any pressure when i use it. Also, the comforter is warm, i don't need any blanket above the comforter any more.
customer_reviews.author: Freda

customer_reviews.title: Nice quilt !
customer_reviews.text: It’s great, I chooses the medium one , very fit the weather in FL when you have AC 24*7 hours. I like it !
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Woo

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect down comforter ! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this comforter a few days ago, it's great quality for the price and absolutely love it!! It’s soft and fluffy without being too hot and heavy. No smells, lots of even fill.just the comforter I was looking for! Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Marco Y

customer_reviews.title: Soft! lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this comforter! It is so soft that I wanted to use all the time. I live in a place where often has dramatic weather changed in a short period. This comforter really works for different season! Besides, the lightweight enable me to package it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a king size quilt with extra warmth. There is no smell when opening the package. It is finely crafted. This thickness is just suitable for the winter in the Bay Area. It is very warm when sleeping at night.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew‘s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect. Perfect for cold/hot/or in between weather. I love it and I’m glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Burney

customer_reviews.title: Super puff
customer_reviews.text: Super puff,comfortable, light weight and breathable. We had a cold spring on east coast. This one saved our lives.
customer_reviews.author: Lancey

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight all season comforter and fit our duvet well. Have only used it in the summer so far, so can't give much input on warmth during colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa Wess

product_meta.title: Serta 300 Thread Count White Down Fiber Extra Warmth Comforter, King
product_meta.description: Size:King| Style Name:Extra WarmthNow you can sleep easy with our all natural Serta 300 thread Count White Down and Feather Fiber Comforter. You can transform your regular sleep for the ultimate comfort experience. The 3 levels of fill weight determinate the level of warmth so regardless of the temperature your room is at, with this White Down and Feather Comforter you will be winding down and resting up .
feature_bullets: THE OUTSIDE: 300 Thread Count, 100% Cotton Down Proof Cover
THE INSIDE: 500 Fill Power 75%+ White Down Fiber

FreshLOFT CLEANS ALLERGENS FREE: We certified that our Natural Down & Feather went through multiple rinse cycles that leans and removes foreign particles, dirt and allergens from the down material, leaving it fresh and with the highest level of purity

SEAL OF QUALITY: Our products are certified by ADFC -American Down and Feather Council & RDS- Responsible Down Standard - MANUFACTURED BY Blue Ridge Home Fashions- Only Authorized vendor to sell Serta

COMFORT YOU CAN BELIEVE IN: Now you can sleep easy with our all natural Serta White Down Comforters You can transform your regular sleep for the ultimate comfort experience Its time to wind down and rest up in comfort

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars45 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
